price: 48. Il nous est révélé que le supplice frappera ceux qui osent démentir (les Signes d’Allah) et qui s’en détournent.” »
arabic: إِنَّا قَدۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡنَآ أَنَّ ٱلۡعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innā qad ūḥiya ilaynā anna al-ʿadhāba ʿalā man kadhaba watawallā
